Definition.WordDefinition: Penn, ND Zip code(s): 58362 Penn, PA (borough, FIPS 58872) Location: 40.32876 N, 79.64167 W Population (1990): 511 (203 housing units) Area: 0.4 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 15675

Penn n 1: Englishman and Quaker who founded the colony of Pennsylvania (1644-1718) [syn: {William Penn}] 2: a university in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania [syn: {University of Pennsylvania}, {Pennsylvania}]
